feature1.explanation: Paragraph 1 uses hyphens and periods, while Paragraph 2 uses periods only. Different punctuation style.

feature2.explanation: Paragraph 1 has a more casual and informal tone with contractions and slang, while Paragraph 2 is more formal with proper grammar and vocabulary. Different lexical and grammatical features.

feature3.explanation: Both paragraphs are relatively short and straightforward. Sentence structure is similar in terms of simplicity. Similar sentence structure and length.

feature4.explanation: Both paragraphs convey factual information without much narrative style. Tone is informative in both. Similar text and discourse features.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors in either paragraph. Similar accuracy in spelling and typing.

overall.explanation: Considering the analysis of the five features, the overall likelihood that the two texts were written by the same author is moderate.
